scripts.npm-test-chrome: npm install && npm install -y nightwatch-cucumber@7.1.10 && npm install -y chromedriver@2.30.1 && npm install -y geckodriver@1.7.1 && npm install -y cucumber-html-reporter@2.0.3 && npm install -y multiple-cucumber-html-reporter@0.2.0 && ./node_modules/.bin/nightwatch --env chrome
scripts.npm-test-firefox: npm install && npm install -y nightwatch-cucumber@7.1.10 && npm install -y chromedriver@2.30.1 && npm install -y geckodriver@1.7.1 && npm install -y cucumber-html-reporter@2.0.3 && npm install -y multiple-cucumber-html-reporter@0.2.0 && ./node_modules/.bin/nightwatch --env firefox
